data.text:
The hotel ambient was awesome. The staff was friendly. The location is based at a very convenient point.

Mr Sohel from Concierge is a special mention for his service. I recommend people to take his assistance. He is very polite and down to earth
data.title: City view Suite

data.text: It was good and quick service. And thank to Soheil for immediate support and constant help. My friends and I stayed 3 months at the hotel. The hotel was very clean and well maintained and staff were always polite and respectful. Expecially Soheil from concierge department who helped even at very late nights with out any hesitation l. Kudos to his great work and the hotel management.
data.title: Deluxe suit

data.text:
I stayed here for a week in January from the UK and if I could give 100 stars, I would! 
the service was 10/10, the staff were beyond helpful & friendly. Breakfast  food was 10/10, delicious and warm. Bed was 10/10 comfortable & room  was gorgeous and so clean ! I was on the 27th floor and the views were absolutely breathtaking! 
The lobby smells so good too! 
I could not ask for any better to be honest! I come to Dubai every year and this was definitely the best hotel I‚Äôve been to, I cannot wait to return to this hotel.
data.title: An absolutely amazing stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a glowing review of your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you had an absolutely amazing experience during your week-long stay with us in January.

It is truly heartwarming to know that you found our service to be 10/10 and that our staff went above and beyond to make your stay memorable. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our delicious and warm breakfast, comfortable beds, gorgeous room, and breathtaking views from the 27th floor.

Your kind words about the cleanliness of our rooms and the pleasant ambiance of our lobby are greatly appreciated. We are truly honored that you consider us the best hotel in Dubai and we cannot wait to welcome you back on your next visit. Our team is already looking forward to creating another exceptional experience for you.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your wonderful feedback. We can't wait to have the pleasure of hosting you again soon!
owner_response.author: Ahmed Mokhtar

data.text: It has been a great experience staying at this hotel, and the facilities, services, and staff have all been exceptional. Professionalism, friendliness, and helpfulness. In the area of housekeeping cleaning and management  As well as mentioning the staff who assisted us during check-out, Mr Rony the supervisor, Mr Jolly the manager, as well as Reenal Mairazul the room attendant.   In addition, I would like to express my gratitude to Ms Lea from Long Term Management for all the support and assistance provided during our stay, All of you did a great jobüëç
data.title: An absolutely stunning flat view overlooking the Burj al Arab and Sheikh Zayed Road

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review of your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the stunning view from your room overlooking the Burj al Arab and Sheikh Zayed Road.

It brings us immense joy to learn that your experience at our hotel was great and that you found our facilities, services, and staff exceptional. We are delighted to receive your kind words describing our team's professionalism, friendliness, and helpfulness. It's heartwarming to hear that our staff members such as Mr. Rony, Mr. Jolly, Reenal Mairazul, and Ms. Lea provided excellent service and support throughout your stay.

We will make sure to pass on your appreciation to them, as well as continue to deliver exceptional service to all our guests. Your feedback motivates us to strive for excellence every day, and we are grateful for your kind words.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your positive experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future.
owner_response.author: Ahmed Mokhtar

data.text:
My family and I stayed 6 nights at the two seasons hotel in Dubai.  The hotel was very clean and fairly well decorated, breakfast was great and fresh, staff were polite and informative.  I can't name all but to name a few are : Adel, Marco, Hani, Marylou, Soheil, and basically all front desk staff which unfortunately I can't recall their names.
The location is good and accessible, the pool was clean and beautifully located at the roof top.
Quite frankly I didn't have any negative experience.  
I only suggest that the hotel update their website and give more information about the hotel and Dubai national holidays, needed by tourists who come from foreign countries.  
Thank you so much and God bless you...
Dr.Shams and family
data.title: Two Seasons is a nice hotel for families.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Dr. Shams 

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback about your recent stay at Two Seasons Hotel in Dubai. We are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic experience and that our facilities and services met your expectations.

I will make sure to pass on your kind words to Adel, Marco, Hani, Marylou, Soheil, and the rest of our front desk staff. Knowing that our team members contributed to making your stay enjoyable reinforces our commitment to delivering exceptional hospitality to all our guests.

We are delighted that you found the hotel clean, well-decorated, and the breakfast great and fresh. It's also heartwarming to hear that you appreciated the convenient location, the cleanliness of the rooftop pool, and the overall positive atmosphere during your stay.

Your suggestion regarding updating our website to provide more information about the hotel and Dubai's national holidays is valuable to us. We will certainly consider this to enhance the overall guest experience and provide important details for tourists visiting from foreign countries.

Once again, thank you for choosing Two Seasons Hotel for your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back in the future. If there is anything else we can assist you with, please do not hesitate to reach out.
owner_response.author: Ahmed Mokhtar
